member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral
member.summary: Provides general functions specific to DDS format

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.DXT1AlphaThreshold
member.summary: Value at which alpha is included in DXT1 conversions. i.e. pixels lower than this threshold are made 100% transparent, and pixels higher are made 100% opaque.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.Read_DDS_HEADER(CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.DDS_HEADER,System.IO.BinaryReader)
member.summary: Reads DDS header from file.
member.param: Header struct.
File reader.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.Read_DDS_PIXELFORMAT(CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.DDS_PIXELFORMAT,System.IO.BinaryReader)
member.summary: Reads DDS pixel format.
member.param: Pixel format struct.
File reader.

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.DDS_HEADER
member.summary: Contains information about DDS Headers.

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.DDS_PIXELFORMAT
member.summary: Contains information about DDS Pixel Format.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.Build_DDS_Header(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat)
member.summary: Builds a header for DDS file format using provided information.
member.param: Number of mips in image.
Image Height.
Image Width.
DDS FourCC.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.Write_DDS_Header(CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.DDS_HEADER,System.IO.BinaryWriter)
member.summary: Write DDS header to stream via BinaryWriter.
member.param: Populated DDS header by Build_DDS_Header.
Stream to write to.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.WriteDDS(System.Collections.Generic.List{CSharpImageLibrary.MipMap},System.IO.Stream,CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.DDS_HEADER,System.Action{System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream,System.Int32,System.Int32},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Writes a DDS file using a format specific function to write pixels.
member.param: List of MipMaps to save. Pixels only.
Stream to save to.
Header to use.
Function to write pixels. Optionally also compresses blocks before writing.
True = Block Compressed DDS. Performs extra manipulation to get and order Texels.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.WriteMipMap(System.IO.Stream,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Action{System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream,System.Int32,System.Int32},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Write a mipmap to a stream using a format specific pixel writing function.
member.param: Pixels of mipmap.
Mipmap Width.
Mipmap Height.
Function to write pixels with. Also compresses if block compressed texture.
True = Block Compressed DDS.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.Decompress8BitBlock(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Decompresses an 8 bit channel.
member.param: Compressed image data.
true = use signed alpha range (-254 -- 255), false = 0 -- 255

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.DecompressRGBBlock(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Decompresses a 3 channel (RGB) block.
member.param: Compressed image data.
True = DXT1, otherwise false.

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.RGBColour
member.summary: This region contains stuff adpated/taken from the DirectXTex project: https://github.com/Microsoft/DirectXTex Things needed to be in the range 0-1 instead of 0-255, hence new struct etc

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.Compress8BitBlock(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Compresses single channel using Block Compression.
member.param: 4 channel Texel to compress.
0-3 (BGRA)
true = uses alpha range -255 -- 255, else 0 -- 255

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.BuildMipMaps(System.Collections.Generic.List{CSharpImageLibrary.MipMap},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Ensures all Mipmaps are generated in MipMaps.
member.param: MipMaps to check.
True = flattens alpha, directly affecting RGB.
member.returns: Number of mipmaps present in MipMaps.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.GetTexel(System.IO.Stream,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets 4x4 texel block from stream.
member.param: Image pixels.
Width of image.
Height of image.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.ReadDXTColour(System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a packed DXT colour into RGB
member.param: Colour to convert to RGB

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.BuildDXTColour(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Creates a packed DXT colour from RGB.
member.param: Red byte.
Green byte.
Blue byte.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.Build8BitPalette(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Builds palette for 8 bit channel.
member.param: First main colour (often actually minimum)
Second main colour (often actually maximum)
true = sets signed alpha range (-254 -- 255), false = 0 -- 255

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.EstimateNumMipMaps(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Estimates number of MipMaps for a given width and height EXCLUDING the top one. i.e. If output is 10, there are 11 mipmaps total.
member.param: Image Width.
Image Height.
member.returns: Number of mipmaps expected for image.

member.summary: Compresses texel to 16 byte BC5 block.
member.param: 4x4 BGRA set of pixels.

member.summary: Decompresses an ATI1 (BC4) block.
member.param: Compressed data stream.

member.summary: Compress texel to 8 byte BC4 compressed block.
member.param: 4x4 BGRA set of pixels.

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage
member.summary: Represents an image. Can use Windows codecs if available.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.header
member.summary: DDS header if existing.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.Width
member.summary: Width of image.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.Height
member.summary: Height of image.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.NumMipMaps
member.summary: Number of mipmaps present.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.Format
member.summary: Format of image and whether it's mippable.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.MipMaps
member.summary: List of mipmaps. Single level images only have one mipmap.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.FilePath
member.summary: Path to file. Null if no file e.g. thumbnail from memory.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new ImageEngineImage from file.
member.param: Path to image file.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Creates new ImageEngineImage from stream. Does NOT require that stream remains alive.
member.param: Image to load.
Extension of original file.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads an image from a file and scales (aspect safe) to a maximum size. e.g. 1024x512, desiredMaxDimension = 128 ===> Image is scaled to 128x64.
member.param: Path to image file.
Max dimension to save.
True = forcibly resizes image. False = attempts to find a suitably sized mipmap, but doesn't resize if none found.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads an image from a stream and scales (aspect safe) to a maximum size. Does NOT require that stream remains alive. e.g. 1024x512, desiredMaxDimension = 128 ===> Image is scaled to 128x64.
member.param: Full image stream.
File extension of original image.
Maximum dimension.
True = forcibly resizes image. False = attempts to find a suitably sized mipmap, but doesn't resize if none found.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.#ctor(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Loads an image from a byte array.
member.param: Fully formatted image file data

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.#ctor(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads an image from a byte array and scales (aspect safe) to a maximum size. e.g. 1024x512, desiredMaxDimension = 128 ===> Image is scaled to 128x64.
member.param: Full image file data.
Maximum dimension.
True = forcibly resizes image. False = attempts to find a suitably sized mipmap, but doesn't resize if none found.
ONLY valid when enforeResize = true. True = flattens alpha, directly affecting RGB.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.#ctor(System.Byte[],CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Loads DDS that has no header - primarily for ME3Explorer. DDS data is standard, just without a header. ASSUMES VALID DDS DATA. Also, single mipmap only.
member.param: Standard DDS data but lacking header.
Surface format of DDS.
Width of image.
Height of image.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.#ctor(CSharpImageLibrary.MipMap,CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat)
member.summary: Builds a DDS image from an existing mipmap.
member.param: Mip to base image on.
Format of mipmap.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.Save(System.String,CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat,CSharpImageLibrary.MipHandling,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Saves image in specified format to file. If file exists, it will be overwritten.
member.param: File to save to.
Desired image format.
Determines how mipmaps are handled during saving.
Maximum size for saved image. Resizes if required, but uses mipmaps if available.
DXT1 only. True = Uses threshold value and alpha values to mask RGB.
Index of mipmap to save as single image.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.Save(System.IO.Stream,CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat,CSharpImageLibrary.MipHandling,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Saves fully formatted image in specified format to stream.
member.param: Stream to save to.
Format to save as.
Determines how mipmaps are handled during saving.
Maximum size for saved image. Resizes if required, but uses mipmaps if available.
ONLY valid when desiredMaxDimension != 0. True = alpha flattened, directly affecting RGB.
Selects a certain mip to save. 0 based.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.Save(CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat,CSharpImageLibrary.MipHandling,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Saves fully formatted image in specified format to byte array.
member.param: Format to save as.
Determines how mipmaps are handled during saving.
Maximum size for saved image. Resizes if required, but uses mipmaps if available.
Index of mipmap to save directly.
ONLY valid when desiredMaxDimension != 0. True = alpha flattened, directly affecting RGB.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.GeneratePreview(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a preview.
member.param: False = Creates a preview without alpha.
Index of mipmap to preview.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.Dispose
member.summary: Releases resources used by mipmap MemoryStreams.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.GetGDIBitmap(System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a GDI+ bitmap from largest mipmap. Does NOT require that image remains alive.
member.param: True = Previews image without alpha channel.
Largest size to display.
ONLY valid when maxDimension is set. True = flattens alpha, directly affecting RGB.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.Resize(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Scales top mipmap and DESTROYS ALL OTHERS.
member.param: Desired size of image.
True = flattens alpha, directly affecting RGB.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.Resize(System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Scales top mipmap and DESTROYS ALL OTHERS.
member.param: Scaling factor.
True = flattens alpha, directly affecting RGB.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineImage.GetWPFBitmap(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a WPF Bitmap from largest mipmap. Does NOT require that image remains alive.
member.param: Only valid if maxDimension set. True = flattens alpha, directly affecting RGB.
Resizes image or uses a mipmap if available.

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.MipMap
member.summary: Represents a mipmap of an image.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.MipMap.BaseImage
member.summary: Pixels in bitmap image.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.MipMap.Width
member.summary: Mipmap width.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.MipMap.Height
member.summary: Mipmap height.

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.TGAFormat
member.summary: The Targa format of the file.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.TGAFormat.UNKNOWN
member.summary: Unknown Targa Image format.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.TGAFormat.ORIGINAL_TGA
member.summary: Original Targa Image format.
member.remarks: Targa Image does not have a Signature of ""TRUEVISION-XFILE"".

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.TGAFormat.NEW_TGA
member.summary: New Targa Image format
member.remarks: Targa Image has a TargaFooter with a Signature of ""TRUEVISION-XFILE"".

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.ColorMapType
member.summary: Indicates the type of color map, if any, included with the image file.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ColorMapType.NO_COLOR_MAP
member.summary: No color map was included in the file.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ColorMapType.COLOR_MAP_INCLUDED
member.summary: Color map was included in the file.

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageType
member.summary: The type of image read from the file.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageType.NO_IMAGE_DATA
member.summary: No image data was found in file.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageType.UNCOMPRESSED_COLOR_MAPPED
member.summary: Image is an uncompressed, indexed color-mapped image.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageType.UNCOMPRESSED_TRUE_COLOR
member.summary: Image is an uncompressed, RGB image.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageType.UNCOMPRESSED_BLACK_AND_WHITE
member.summary: Image is an uncompressed, Greyscale image.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageType.RUN_LENGTH_ENCODED_COLOR_MAPPED
member.summary: Image is a compressed, indexed color-mapped image.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageType.RUN_LENGTH_ENCODED_TRUE_COLOR
member.summary: Image is a compressed, RGB image.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageType.RUN_LENGTH_ENCODED_BLACK_AND_WHITE
member.summary: Image is a compressed, Greyscale image.

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.VerticalTransferOrder
member.summary: The top-to-bottom ordering in which pixel data is transferred from the file to the screen.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.VerticalTransferOrder.UNKNOWN
member.summary: Unknown transfer order.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.VerticalTransferOrder.BOTTOM
member.summary: Transfer order of pixels is from the bottom to top.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.VerticalTransferOrder.TOP
member.summary: Transfer order of pixels is from the top to bottom.

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.HorizontalTransferOrder
member.summary: The left-to-right ordering in which pixel data is transferred from the file to the screen.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.HorizontalTransferOrder.UNKNOWN
member.summary: Unknown transfer order.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.HorizontalTransferOrder.RIGHT
member.summary: Transfer order of pixels is from the right to left.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.HorizontalTransferOrder.LEFT
member.summary: Transfer order of pixels is from the left to right.

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.FirstPixelDestination
member.summary: Screen destination of first pixel based on the VerticalTransferOrder and HorizontalTransferOrder.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.FirstPixelDestination.UNKNOWN
member.summary: Unknown first pixel destination.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.FirstPixelDestination.TOP_LEFT
member.summary: First pixel destination is the top-left corner of the image.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.FirstPixelDestination.TOP_RIGHT
member.summary: First pixel destination is the top-right corner of the image.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.FirstPixelDestination.BOTTOM_LEFT
member.summary: First pixel destination is the bottom-left corner of the image.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.FirstPixelDestination.BOTTOM_RIGHT
member.summary: First pixel destination is the bottom-right corner of the image.

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.RLEPacketType
member.summary: The RLE packet type used in a RLE compressed image.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.RLEPacketType.RAW
member.summary: A raw RLE packet type.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.RLEPacketType.RUN_LENGTH
member.summary: A run-length RLE packet type.

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage
member.summary: Reads and loads a Truevision TGA Format image file.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the TargaImage object.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage.Header
member.summary: Gets a TargaHeader object that holds the Targa Header information of the loaded file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage.ExtensionArea
member.summary: Gets a TargaExtensionArea object that holds the Targa Extension Area information of the loaded file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage.Footer
member.summary: Gets a TargaExtensionArea object that holds the Targa Footer information of the loaded file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage.Format
member.summary: Gets the Targa format of the loaded file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage.Image
member.summary: Gets a Bitmap representation of the loaded file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage.Thumbnail
member.summary: Gets the thumbnail of the loaded file if there is one in the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage.FileName
member.summary: Gets the full path and filename of the loaded file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage.Stride
member.summary: Gets the byte offset between the beginning of one scan line and the next. Used when loading the image into the Image Bitmap.
member.remarks: The memory allocated for Microsoft Bitmaps must be aligned on a 32bit boundary. The stride refers to the number of bytes allocated for one scanline of the bitmap.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage.Padding
member.summary: Gets the number of bytes used to pad each scan line to meet the Stride value. Used when loading the image into the Image Bitmap.
member.remarks: The memory allocated for Microsoft Bitmaps must be aligned on a 32bit boundary. The stride refers to the number of bytes allocated for one scanline of the bitmap. In your loop, you copy the pixels one scanline at a time and take into consideration the amount of padding that occurs due to memory alignment.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage.Finalize
member.summary: TargaImage deconstructor.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the TargaImage object with strFileName as the image loaded.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage.LoadTGAFooterInfo(System.IO.BinaryReader)
member.summary: Loads the Targa Footer information from the file.
member.param: A BinaryReader that points the loaded file byte stream.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage.LoadTGAHeaderInfo(System.IO.BinaryReader)
member.summary: Loads the Targa Header information from the file.
member.param: A BinaryReader that points the loaded file byte stream.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage.LoadTGAExtensionArea(System.IO.BinaryReader)
member.summary: Loads the Targa Extension Area from the file, if it exists.
member.param: A BinaryReader that points the loaded file byte stream.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage.LoadImageBytes(System.IO.BinaryReader)
member.summary: Reads the image data bytes from the file. Handles Uncompressed and RLE Compressed image data. Uses FirstPixelDestination to properly align the image.
member.param: A BinaryReader that points the loaded file byte stream.
member.returns: An array of bytes representing the image data in the proper alignment.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage.LoadTGAImage(System.IO.BinaryReader)
member.summary: Reads the image data bytes from the file and loads them into the Image Bitmap object. Also loads the color map, if any, into the Image Bitmap.
member.param: A BinaryReader that points the loaded file byte stream.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage.GetPixelFormat
member.summary: Gets the PixelFormat to be used by the Image based on the Targa file's attributes

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage.LoadThumbnail(System.IO.BinaryReader,System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat)
member.summary: Loads the thumbnail of the loaded image file, if any.
member.param: A BinaryReader that points the loaded file byte stream.
A PixelFormat value indicating what pixel format to use when loading the thumbnail.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage.ClearAll
member.summary: Clears out all objects and resources.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage.LoadTargaImage(System.String)
member.summary: Loads a Targa image file into a Bitmap object.
member.param: The Targa image filename
member.returns: A Bitmap object with the Targa image loaded into it.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes all resources used by this instance of the TargaImage class.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaImage.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Dispose(bool disposing) executes in two distinct scenarios. If disposing equals true, the method has been called directly or indirectly by a user's code. Managed and unmanaged resources can be disposed. If disposing equals false, the method has been called by the runtime from inside the finalizer and you should not reference other objects. Only unmanaged resources can be disposed.
member.param: If true dispose all resources, else dispose only release unmanaged resources.

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader
member.summary: This class holds all of the header properties of a Targa image. This includes the TGA File Header section the ImageID and the Color Map.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.ImageIDLength
member.summary: Gets the number of bytes contained the ImageIDValue property. The maximum number of characters is 255. A value of zero indicates that no ImageIDValue is included with the image.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.SetImageIDLength(System.Byte)
member.summary: Sets the ImageIDLength property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: The Image ID Length value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.ColorMapType
member.summary: Gets the type of color map (if any) included with the image. There are currently 2 defined values for this field: NO_COLOR_MAP - indicates that no color-map data is included with this image. COLOR_MAP_INCLUDED - indicates that a color-map is included with this image.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.SetColorMapType(CSharpImageLibrary.ColorMapType)
member.summary: Sets the ColorMapType property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: One of the ColorMapType enumeration values.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.ImageType
member.summary: Gets one of the ImageType enumeration values indicating the type of Targa image read from the file.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.SetImageType(CSharpImageLibrary.ImageType)
member.summary: Sets the ImageType property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: One of the ImageType enumeration values.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.ColorMapFirstEntryIndex
member.summary: Gets the index of the first color map entry. ColorMapFirstEntryIndex refers to the starting entry in loading the color map.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.SetColorMapFirstEntryIndex(System.Int16)
member.summary: Sets the ColorMapFirstEntryIndex property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: The First Entry Index value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.ColorMapLength
member.summary: Gets total number of color map entries included.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.SetColorMapLength(System.Int16)
member.summary: Sets the ColorMapLength property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: The Color Map Length value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.ColorMapEntrySize
member.summary: Gets the number of bits per entry in the Color Map. Typically 15, 16, 24 or 32-bit values are used.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.SetColorMapEntrySize(System.Byte)
member.summary: Sets the ColorMapEntrySize property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: The Color Map Entry Size value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.XOrigin
member.summary: Gets the absolute horizontal coordinate for the lower left corner of the image as it is positioned on a display device having an origin at the lower left of the screen (e.g., the TARGA series).

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.SetXOrigin(System.Int16)
member.summary: Sets the XOrigin property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: The X Origin value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.YOrigin
member.summary: These bytes specify the absolute vertical coordinate for the lower left corner of the image as it is positioned on a display device having an origin at the lower left of the screen (e.g., the TARGA series).

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.SetYOrigin(System.Int16)
member.summary: Sets the YOrigin property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: The Y Origin value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.Width
member.summary: Gets the width of the image in pixels.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.SetWidth(System.Int16)
member.summary: Sets the Width property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: The Width value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.Height
member.summary: Gets the height of the image in pixels.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.SetHeight(System.Int16)
member.summary: Sets the Height property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: The Height value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.PixelDepth
member.summary: Gets the number of bits per pixel. This number includes the Attribute or Alpha channel bits. Common values are 8, 16, 24 and 32.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.SetPixelDepth(System.Byte)
member.summary: Sets the PixelDepth property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: The Pixel Depth value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.ImageDescriptor
member.summary: Gets or Sets the ImageDescriptor property. The ImageDescriptor is the byte that holds the Image Origin and Attribute Bits values. Available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.FirstPixelDestination
member.summary: Gets one of the FirstPixelDestination enumeration values specifying the screen destination of first pixel based on VerticalTransferOrder and HorizontalTransferOrder

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.VerticalTransferOrder
member.summary: Gets one of the VerticalTransferOrder enumeration values specifying the top-to-bottom ordering in which pixel data is transferred from the file to the screen.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.SetVerticalTransferOrder(CSharpImageLibrary.VerticalTransferOrder)
member.summary: Sets the VerticalTransferOrder property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: One of the VerticalTransferOrder enumeration values.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.HorizontalTransferOrder
member.summary: Gets one of the HorizontalTransferOrder enumeration values specifying the left-to-right ordering in which pixel data is transferred from the file to the screen.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.SetHorizontalTransferOrder(CSharpImageLibrary.HorizontalTransferOrder)
member.summary: Sets the HorizontalTransferOrder property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: One of the HorizontalTransferOrder enumeration values.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.AttributeBits
member.summary: Gets the number of attribute bits per pixel.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.SetAttributeBits(System.Byte)
member.summary: Sets the AttributeBits property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: The Attribute Bits value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.ImageIDValue
member.summary: Gets identifying information about the image. A value of zero in ImageIDLength indicates that no ImageIDValue is included with the image.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.SetImageIDValue(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the ImageIDValue property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: The Image ID value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.ColorMap
member.summary: Gets the Color Map of the image, if any. The Color Map is represented by a list of System.Drawing.Color objects.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.ImageDataOffset
member.summary: Gets the offset from the beginning of the file to the Image Data.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaHeader.BytesPerPixel
member.summary: Gets the number of bytes per pixel.

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaFooter
member.summary: Holds Footer infomation read from the image file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaFooter.ExtensionAreaOffset
member.summary: Gets the offset from the beginning of the file to the start of the Extension Area. If the ExtensionAreaOffset is zero, no Extension Area exists in the file.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaFooter.SetExtensionAreaOffset(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the ExtensionAreaOffset property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaFooter.
member.param: The Extension Area Offset value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaFooter.DeveloperDirectoryOffset
member.summary: Gets the offset from the beginning of the file to the start of the Developer Area. If the DeveloperDirectoryOffset is zero, then the Developer Area does not exist

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaFooter.SetDeveloperDirectoryOffset(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the DeveloperDirectoryOffset property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaFooter.
member.param: The Developer Directory Offset value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaFooter.Signature
member.summary: This string is formatted exactly as "TRUEVISION-XFILE" (no quotes). If the signature is detected, the file is assumed to be a New TGA format and MAY, therefore, contain the Developer Area and/or the Extension Areas. If the signature is not found, then the file is assumed to be an Original TGA format.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaFooter.SetSignature(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the Signature property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaFooter.
member.param: The Signature value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaFooter.ReservedCharacter
member.summary: A New Targa format reserved character "." (period)

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaFooter.SetReservedCharacter(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the ReservedCharacter property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaFooter.
member.param: The ReservedCharacter value read from the file.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaFooter.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the TargaFooter class.

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea
member.summary: This class holds all of the Extension Area properties of the Targa image. If an Extension Area exists in the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.ExtensionSize
member.summary: Gets the number of Bytes in the fixed-length portion of the ExtensionArea. For Version 2.0 of the TGA File Format, this number should be set to 495

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.SetExtensionSize(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the ExtensionSize property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Extension Size value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.AuthorName
member.summary: Gets the name of the person who created the image.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.SetAuthorName(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the AuthorName property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Author Name value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.AuthorComments
member.summary: Gets the comments from the author who created the image.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.SetAuthorComments(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the AuthorComments property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Author Comments value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.DateTimeStamp
member.summary: Gets the date and time that the image was saved.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.SetDateTimeStamp(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Sets the DateTimeStamp property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Date Time Stamp value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.JobName
member.summary: Gets the name or id tag which refers to the job with which the image was associated.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.SetJobName(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the JobName property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Job Name value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.JobTime
member.summary: Gets the job elapsed time when the image was saved.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.SetJobTime(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the JobTime property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Job Time value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.SoftwareID
member.summary: Gets the Software ID. Usually used to determine and record with what program a particular image was created.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.SetSoftwareID(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the SoftwareID property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Software ID value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.SoftwareVersion
member.summary: Gets the version of software defined by the SoftwareID.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.SetSoftwareVersion(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the SoftwareVersion property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Software Version value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.KeyColor
member.summary: Gets the key color in effect at the time the image is saved. The Key Color can be thought of as the "background color" or "transparent color".

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.SetKeyColor(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Sets the KeyColor property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Key Color value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.PixelAspectRatioNumerator
member.summary: Gets the Pixel Ratio Numerator.

member.summary: Sets the PixelAspectRatioNumerator property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Pixel Aspect Ratio Numerator value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.PixelAspectRatioDenominator
member.summary: Gets the Pixel Ratio Denominator.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.SetPixelAspectRatioDenominator(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the PixelAspectRatioDenominator property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Pixel Aspect Ratio Denominator value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.PixelAspectRatio
member.summary: Gets the Pixel Aspect Ratio.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.GammaNumerator
member.summary: Gets the Gamma Numerator.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.SetGammaNumerator(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the GammaNumerator property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Gamma Numerator value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.GammaDenominator
member.summary: Gets the Gamma Denominator.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.SetGammaDenominator(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the GammaDenominator property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Gamma Denominator value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.GammaRatio
member.summary: Gets the Gamma Ratio.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.ColorCorrectionOffset
member.summary: Gets the offset from the beginning of the file to the start of the Color Correction table.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.SetColorCorrectionOffset(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the ColorCorrectionOffset property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Color Correction Offset value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.PostageStampOffset
member.summary: Gets the offset from the beginning of the file to the start of the Postage Stamp image data.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.SetPostageStampOffset(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the PostageStampOffset property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Postage Stamp Offset value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.ScanLineOffset
member.summary: Gets the offset from the beginning of the file to the start of the Scan Line table.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.SetScanLineOffset(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the ScanLineOffset property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Scan Line Offset value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.AttributesType
member.summary: Gets the type of Alpha channel data contained in the file. 0: No Alpha data included. 1: Undefined data in the Alpha field, can be ignored 2: Undefined data in the Alpha field, but should be retained 3: Useful Alpha channel data is present 4: Pre-multiplied Alpha (see description below) 5-127: RESERVED 128-255: Un-assigned

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.SetAttributesType(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the AttributesType property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Attributes Type value read from the file.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.ScanLineTable
member.summary: Gets a list of offsets from the beginning of the file that point to the start of the next scan line, in the order that the image was saved

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.TargaExtensionArea.ColorCorrectionTable
member.summary: Gets a list of Colors where each Color value is the desired Color correction for that entry. This allows the user to store a correction table for image remapping or LUT driving.

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.Utilities
member.summary: Utilities functions used by the TargaImage class.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.Utilities.GetBits(System.Byte,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets an int value representing the subset of bits from a single Byte.
member.param: The Byte used to get the subset of bits from.
The offset of bits starting from the right.
The number of bits to read.
member.returns: An int value representing the subset of bits.
member.remarks: Given -> b = 00110101 A call to GetBits(b, 2, 4) GetBits looks at the following bits in the byte -> 00{1101}00 Returns 1101 as an int (13)

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.Utilities.GetColorFrom2Bytes(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Reads ARGB values from the 16 bits of two given Bytes in a 1555 format.
member.param: The first Byte.
The Second Byte.
member.returns: A System.Drawing.Color with a ARGB values read from the two given Bytes
member.remarks: Gets the ARGB values from the 16 bits in the two bytes based on the below diagram | BYTE 1 | BYTE 2 | | A RRRRR GG | GGG BBBBB |

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.Utilities.GetIntBinaryString(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a 32 character binary string of the specified Int32 value.
member.param: The value to get a binary string for.
member.returns: A string with the resulting binary for the supplied value.
member.remarks: This method was used during debugging and is left here just for fun.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.Utilities.GetInt16BinaryString(System.Int16)
member.summary: Gets a 16 character binary string of the specified Int16 value.
member.param: The value to get a binary string for.
member.returns: A string with the resulting binary for the supplied value.
member.remarks: This method was used during debugging and is left here just for fun.

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.ViewModel
member.summary: View model for the main Converter form

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.WIC_Codecs
member.summary: Provides native Windows codec functionality for Windows 8.1+.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.WIC_Codecs.WindowsCodecsPresent
member.summary: Tests whether Windows WIC Codecs are present.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.WIC_Codecs.LoadWithCodecs(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads useful information from an image file.
member.param: Path to image file.
Width to decode to. Aspect unchanged if decodeHeight = 0.
Height to decode to. Aspect unchanged if decodeWidth = 0.
True = Image is a DDS.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.WIC_Codecs.LoadWithCodecs(System.IO.Stream,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads useful information from image stream using Windows 8.1+ codecs.
member.param: Stream containing entire file. NOT just pixels.
Width to decode as. Aspect ratio unchanged if decodeHeight = 0.
Height to decode as. Aspect ratio unchanged if decodeWidth = 0.
True = image is a DDS.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.WIC_Codecs.AttemptUsingWindowsCodecs(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Attempts to read image using WIC Codecs. Returns null if unable to.
member.param: Path to image file.
Height to decode to. 0 = no scaling.
Width to decode to. 0 = no scaling.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.WIC_Codecs.AttemptUsingWindowsCodecs(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Attempts to read image using WIC Codecs. Returns null if unable to.
member.param: Entire image file. NOT raw pixel data.
Width to decode to. 0 = no scaling.
Height to decode to. 0 = no scaling.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.WIC_Codecs.AttemptUsingWindowsCodecs(System.IO.Stream,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Attempts to read image using WIC Codecs. Returns null if unable to.
member.param: Stream containing entire file. NOT raw pixels.
Width to decode to. Aspect unchanged if decodeHeight = 0.
Height to decode to. Aspect unchanged if decodeWidth = 0.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.WIC_Codecs.SaveWithCodecs(System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource,System.IO.Stream,CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat)
member.summary: Saves image using internal Codecs - DDS and mippables not supported.
member.param: Image as bmp source.
Image stream to save to.
Destination image format.

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.App
member.summary: Interaction logic for App.xaml

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.MipHandling
member.summary: Determines how Mipmaps are handled.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.MipHandling.Default
member.summary: If mips are present, they are used, otherwise regenerated.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.MipHandling.KeepExisting
member.summary: Keeps existing mips if existing. Doesn't generate new ones either way.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.MipHandling.GenerateNew
member.summary: Removes old mips and generates new ones.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.MipHandling.KeepTopOnly
member.summary: Removes all but the top mip. Used for single mip formats.

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngine
member.summary: Provides main image functions

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngine.WindowsWICCodecsAvailable
member.summary: True = Windows WIC Codecs are present (8+)

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngine.EnableThreading
member.summary: True = Loading and saving operations are threaded.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngine.#cctor
member.summary: Constructor. Checks WIC status before any other operation.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngine.LoadImage(System.String,CSharpImageLibrary.Format@,System.Int32,System.Boolean,CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.DDS_HEADER@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads image from file.
member.param: Path to image file.
Detected format.
True = image resized to desiredMaxDimension if no suitable mipmap.
DDS header of image.
Largest dimension to load as.
True = Flattens alpha down, directly affecting RGB.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngine.LoadImage(System.IO.Stream,CSharpImageLibrary.Format@,System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean,CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.DDS_HEADER@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads image from stream.
member.param: Full image stream.
Detected format.
File extension. Used to determine format more easily.
ONLY valid when enforceResize is true. True = Flattens alpha down, directly affecting RGB.
True = image resized to desiredMaxDimension if no suitable mipmap.
DDS header of image.
Largest dimension to load as. ASSUMES SQUARE.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngine.LoadImage(System.IO.Stream,CSharpImageLibrary.Format@,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.DDS_HEADER@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads image from stream.
member.param: Full image stream.
Detected Format.
File Extension. Used to determine format more easily.
Maximum width to allow when loading. Resized if enforceResize = true.
Maximum height to allow when loading. Resized if enforceResize = true.
True = Resizes image to match either maxWidth or maxHeight.
DDS header of image.
ONLY valid when enforceResize is true. True = Flattens alpha down, directly affecting RGB.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngine.Save(System.Collections.Generic.List{CSharpImageLibrary.MipMap},CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat,System.IO.Stream,CSharpImageLibrary.MipHandling,System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Save mipmaps as given format to stream.
member.param: List of Mips to save.
Desired format.
Stream to save to.
Determines how to handle mipmaps.
Maximum value for either image dimension.
True = alpha flattened down, directly affecting RGB.
0 based index on which mipmap to make top of saved image.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngine.Save(System.Collections.Generic.List{CSharpImageLibrary.MipMap},CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat,CSharpImageLibrary.MipHandling,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Saves image to byte[].
member.param: Mipmaps to save.
Format to save image as.
Determines how to handle mipmaps.
Maximum dimension to allow. Resizes if required.
Mipmap to save. If > 0, all other mipmaps removed, and this mipmap saved.
True = Flattens alpha into RGB.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngine.DestroyMipMaps(System.Collections.Generic.List{CSharpImageLibrary.MipMap},System.Int32)
member.summary: Destroys mipmaps. Expects at least one mipmap in given list.
member.param: List of Mipmaps.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngine.GenerateThumbnailToStream(System.IO.Stream,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Generates a thumbnail image as quickly and efficiently as possible.
member.param: Full image stream.
Max height to decode at. 0 means ignored, and aspect respected.
Max width to decode at. 0 means ignored, and aspect respected.
DXT1 only. True = Flatten alpha into RGB.
True = uses PNG compression instead of JPG.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngine.GenerateThumbnailToFile(System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Generates a thumbnail of image and saves it to a file.
member.param: Fully formatted image stream.
File path to save to.
Maximum value for either image dimension.
DXT1 only. True = Flatten alpha into RGB.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngine.ParseFromString(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a string to an ImageEngineFormat.
member.param: String representation of ImageEngineFormat.

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat
member.summary: Indicates image format. Use FORMAT struct.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat.Unknown
member.summary: Unknown image format. Using this as a save/load format will fail that operation.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat.JPG
member.summary: Standard JPEG image handled by everything.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat.PNG
member.summary: Standard PNG image handled by everything. Uses alpha channel if available.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat.BMP
member.summary: Standard BMP image handled by everything.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat.TGA
member.summary: Targa image. Multipage format. Can be used for mipmaps.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat.DDS_DXT1
member.summary: (BC1) Block Compressed Texture. Compresses 4x4 texels. Used for Simple Non Alpha.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat.DDS_DXT2
member.summary: (BC2) Block Compressed Texture. Compresses 4x4 texels. Used for Sharp Alpha. Premultiplied alpha.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat.DDS_DXT3
member.summary: (BC2) Block Compressed Texture. Compresses 4x4 texels. Used for Sharp Alpha.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat.DDS_DXT4
member.summary: (BC3) Block Compressed Texture. Compresses 4x4 texels. Used for Gradient Alpha. Premultiplied alpha.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat.DDS_DXT5
member.summary: (BC3) Block Compressed Texture. Compresses 4x4 texels. Used for Gradient Alpha.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat.DDS_ARGB
member.summary: Uncompressed ARGB DDS.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat.DDS_ATI1
member.summary: (BC4) Block Compressed Texture. Compresses 4x4 texels. Used for Normal (bump) Maps. 8 bit single channel with alpha.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat.DDS_V8U8
member.summary: Uncompressed pair of 8 bit channels. Used for Normal (bump) maps.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat.DDS_G8_L8
member.summary: Pair of 8 bit channels. Used for Luminescence.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat.DDS_A8L8
member.summary: Alpha and single channel luminescence. Uncompressed.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat.DDS_RGB
member.summary: RGB. No alpha. Uncompressed.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat.DDS_ATI2_3Dc
member.summary: (BC5) Block Compressed Texture. Compresses 4x4 texels. Used for Normal (bump) Maps. Pair of 8 bit channels.

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.Format
member.summary: Indicates image format and whether it's a mippable format or not.

member.name: F:CSharpImageLibrary.Format.SurfaceFormat
member.summary: Image format

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.Format.IsMippable
member.summary: True = can have mipmaps.

member.name: P:CSharpImageLibrary.Format.BlockSize
member.summary: Size of a compressed block. Returns -1 if format is not block compressed

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.Format.#ctor(CSharpImageLibrary.ImageEngineFormat)
member.summary: Initialises a Format with an image format.
member.param: Image format

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.Format.ToString
member.summary: Displays useful information about state of object.

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageFormats
member.summary: Provides format functionality

member.name: T:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageFormats.SupportedExtensions
member.summary: File extensions supported. Used to get initial format.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageFormats.ParseFourCC(System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts a DDS FourCC to a Format.
member.param: DDS FourCC to check.
member.returns: Format specified by FourCC. Otherwise ARGB.

member.name: M:CSharpImageLibrary.ImageFormats.ParseFormat(System.IO.Stream,System.String,CSharpImageLibrary.DDSGeneral.DDS_HEADER@)
member.summary: Gets image format from stream containing image file, along with extension of image file.
